code: import axios from"axios";var baseUrl="/api/persons";var getAll=function getAll(){var data=axios.get(baseUrl);return data.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var createPerson=function createPerson(newObject){var data=axios.post(baseUrl,newObject);return data.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var updatePerson=function updatePerson(id,newObject){var data=axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),newObject);return data.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var deletePerson=function deletePerson(id,obj){var data=axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),{data:obj});return data.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var entryService={getAll:getAll,createPerson:createPerson,updatePerson:updatePerson,deletePerson:deletePerson};export default entryService;
